circumstances: The flight was initiated in heavy rain falls. After take off, while climbing, both engines lost power and the aircraft lost height before crashing on Mt Digboi located in the Naga mountain range, few miles from the Dinjan Airport. The wreckage was spotted a day later and all three crew members were killed.
probable_cause: Both engines lost power during climb, most probably because the fuel was contaminated by water. The accident occurred in heavy rain showers.
